verses.verse: And in the seventh<WH7637> month,<WH2320> on<WH5921> the first<WH259> day of the month,<WH2320> you shall have<WH1961> an holy<WH6944> convocation;<WH4744> you shall do<WH6213> no<WH3605> <WH3808> servile<WH5656> work:<WH4399> it is a day<WH3117> of blowing<WH8643> the trumpets to you.

And you shall offer<WH6213> a burnt<WH5930> offering for a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> to the LORD;<WH3068> one<WH259> young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullock,<WH6499> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> and seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without<WH8549> blemish:<WH8549>

And their meat offering<WH4503> shall be of flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> three<WH7969> tenth<WH6241> deals for a bullock,<WH6499> and two<WH8147> tenth<WH6241> deals for a ram,<WH352>
And one<WH259> tenth<WH6241> deal for one<WH259> lamb,<WH3532> throughout the seven<WH7651> lambs:<WH3532>
And one<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering, to make an atonement<WH3722> for you:

Beside<WH905> the burnt<WH5930> offering of the month,<WH2320> and his meat offering,<WH4503> and the daily<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH4503> and his meat offering, and their drink<WH5262> offerings, according to their manner,<WH4941> for a sweet<WH5207> smell,<WH7381> a sacrifice made by fire to the LORD.<WH3068>

And you shall have<WH1961> on<WH5921> the tenth<WH6218> day of this<WH2088> seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> an holy<WH6944> convocation;<WH4744> and you shall afflict<WH6031> your souls:<WH5315> you shall not do<WH6213> any<WH3605> work<WH4399> therein:

But you shall offer<WH7126> a burnt<WH5930> offering to the LORD<WH3068> for a sweet<WH5207> smell;<WH7381> one<WH259> young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullock,<WH6499> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> and seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year;<WH8141> they shall be to you without<WH8549> blemish:<WH8549>

And their meat offering<WH4503> shall be of flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> three<WH7969> tenth<WH6241> deals to a bullock,<WH6499> and two<WH8147> tenth<WH6241> deals to one<WH259> ram,<WH352>
A several tenth<WH6241> deal for one<WH259> lamb,<WH3532> throughout the seven<WH7651> lambs:<WH3532>

One<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering; beside<WH905> the sin<WH2403> offering of atonement,<WH3725> and the continual<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH4503> and the meat offering of it, and their drink<WH5262> offerings.

And on<WH5921> the fifteenth<WH2568> <WH6240> day<WH3117> of the seventh<WH7637> month<WH2320> you shall have<WH1961> an holy<WH6944> convocation;<WH4744> you shall do<WH6213> no<WH3605> <WH3808> servile<WH5656> work,<WH4399> and you shall keep<WH2287> a feast<WH2282> to the LORD<WH3068> seven<WH7651> days:<WH3117>

And you shall offer<WH7126> a burnt<WH5930> offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> to the LORD;<WH3068> thirteen<WH7969> <WH6240> young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullocks,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> and fourteen<WH702> <WH6246> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year;<WH8141> they shall be without<WH8549> blemish:<WH8549>

And their meat offering<WH4503> shall be of flour<WH5560> mingled<WH1101> with oil,<WH8081> three<WH7969> tenth<WH6241> deals to every<WH259> bullock<WH6499> of the thirteen<WH7969> <WH6240> bullocks,<WH6499> two<WH8147> tenth<WH6241> deals to each<WH259> ram<WH352> of the two<WH8147> rams,<WH352>
And a several tenth<WH6241> deal to each<WH259> lamb<WH3532> of the fourteen<WH702> <WH6246> lambs:<WH3532>
And one<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH4503> his meat offering, and his drink<WH5262> offering.

And on<WH5921> the second<WH8145> day<WH3117> you shall offer twelve<WH8147> <WH6240> young<WH1121> <WH1241> bullocks,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> fourteen<WH702> <WH6246> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without<WH8549> spot:<WH8549>

And their meat offering<WH4503> and their drink<WH5262> offerings for the bullocks,<WH6499> for the rams,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> shall be according to their number,<WH4557> after the manner:<WH4941>

And one<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH4503> and the meat offering thereof, and their drink<WH5262> offerings.

And on<WH5921> the third<WH7992> day<WH3117> eleven<WH6249> <WH6240> bullocks,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> fourteen<WH702> <WH6246> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without<WH8549> blemish;<WH8549>

And their meat offering<WH4503> and their drink<WH5262> offerings for the bullocks,<WH6499> for the rams,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> shall be according to their number,<WH4557> after the manner:<WH4941>
And one<WH259> goat<WH8163> for a sin<WH2403> offering; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH4503> and his meat offering, and his drink<WH5262> offering.

And on<WH5921> the fourth<WH7243> day<WH3117> ten<WH6235> bullocks,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> and fourteen<WH702> <WH6246> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without<WH8549> blemish:<WH8549>

Their meat offering<WH4503> and their drink<WH5262> offerings for the bullocks,<WH6499> for the rams,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> shall be according to their number,<WH4557> after the manner:<WH4941>
And one<WH259> kid<WH8163> of the goats<WH5795> for a sin<WH2403> offering; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH4503> his meat offering, and his drink<WH5262> offering.

And on<WH5921> the fifth<WH2549> day<WH3117> nine<WH8672> bullocks,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> and fourteen<WH702> <WH6246> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without<WH8549> spot:<WH8549>

And their meat offering<WH4503> and their drink<WH5262> offerings for the bullocks,<WH6499> for the rams,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> shall be according to their number,<WH4557> after the manner:<WH4941>
And one<WH259> goat<WH8163> for a sin<WH2403> offering; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH4503> and his meat offering, and his drink<WH5262> offering.

And on<WH5921> the sixth<WH8345> day<WH3117> eight<WH8083> bullocks,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> and fourteen<WH702> <WH6246> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without<WH8549> blemish:<WH8549>

And their meat offering<WH4503> and their drink<WH5262> offerings for the bullocks,<WH6499> for the rams,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> shall be according to their number,<WH4557> after the manner:<WH4941>
And one<WH259> goat<WH8163> for a sin<WH2403> offering; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH4503> his meat offering, and his drink<WH5262> offering.

And on<WH5921> the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> seven<WH7651> bullocks,<WH6499> two<WH8147> rams,<WH352> and fourteen<WH702> <WH6246> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without<WH8549> blemish:<WH8549>

And their meat offering<WH4503> and their drink<WH5262> offerings for the bullocks,<WH6499> for the rams,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> shall be according to their number,<WH4557> after the manner:<WH4941>
And one<WH259> goat<WH8163> for a sin<WH2403> offering; beside the continual<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH4503> his meat offering, and his drink<WH5262> offering.
On<WH5921> the eighth<WH8066> day<WH3117> you shall have<WH1961> a solemn<WH6116> assembly:<WH6116> you shall do<WH6213> no<WH3605> <WH3808> servile<WH5656> work<WH4399> therein:

But you shall offer<WH7126> a burnt<WH5930> offering, a sacrifice made by fire, of a sweet<WH5207> smell<WH7381> to the LORD:<WH3068> one<WH259> bullock,<WH6499> one<WH259> ram,<WH352> seven<WH7651> lambs<WH3532> of the first<WH1121> year<WH8141> without<WH8549> blemish:<WH8549>

Their meat offering<WH4503> and their drink<WH5262> offerings for the bullock,<WH6499> for the ram,<WH352> and for the lambs,<WH3532> shall be according to their number,<WH4557> after the manner:<WH4941>
And one<WH259> goat<WH8163> for a sin<WH2403> offering; beside<WH905> the continual<WH8548> burnt<WH5930> offering,<WH4503> and his meat offering, and his drink<WH5262> offering.

These<WH428> things you shall do<WH6213> to the LORD<WH3068> in your set<WH4150> feasts,<WH4150> beside<WH905> your vows,<WH5088> and your freewill<WH5071> offerings, for your burnt<WH5930> offerings,<WH4503> and for your meat offerings, and for your drink<WH5262> offerings, and for your peace<WH8002> offerings.
And Moses<WH4872> told<WH559> the children<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478> according to all<WH3605> that the LORD<WH3068> commanded<WH6680> Moses.<WH4872>
